title: Strengthening Hospitality Practice Competency: Anaerobic Digester Process Control via Web-Based Virtual Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Using web-based virtual simulation tools, learners will adjust key operational parameters of anaerobic digesters (e.g., inflow rate, temperature, pH).
Learners will analyze simulation results to propose process stability and optimization strategies.
Learners will explain engineering and economic constraints to consider when designing anaerobic digesters.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
